name: gestureRecognizer(_:shouldRequireFailureOf:)
desc: Asks the delegate if the current gesture recognizer must wait to recognize its gesture until the specified gesture recognizer fails.
declaration:
optional func gestureRecognizer(_ gestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer, 
         shouldRequireFailureOf otherGestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer) -> Bool
